author: remm
msg: - Make the log with accept sound a bit worse (it's an unexpected error, after all).
- The recylcle method should sync on processors IMO. This could be the
cause for 5735. Unfortunately, my ab on Cygwin isn't able to generate a very
high concurrency level, so I can't test it.
- Craig, do you think that change is a good idea ?
- Note: If it turns out this fixes problems, the change will need to be ported to all
connectors based on the thread pool.
